content:
Ampathunaallin nompinnaall - sampoornnatha sampraapippu
Maanavare rakshicheeshan -moonnaam naallilezhunnettu.
Kartthan veeryamoduththhaanam- cheythaanenna visheshatthe
Shishyanmaarodu chollaan thaan-shlommo shishyakallodothi.
Ullaasatthaal shishyanmaar-kallaraye nokki paanyu.
Sookshichavar nokkeedumpoll-thalsthhaane roomaal kandu.
Vismayamerum vasthratthe - shishyavaran kaiyil peri
Bheethi nimittham kaavalkkaar-prethangallkkoppam ninnu.
Kayyaappaa naanam poondu-vismayavum vyathhayum nedi
Duà´ƒkham moolam yoodanmaar-dikkukallil paarippoyi.
Choran parudaisaa nedi-van narakatthe yoodaayum
Maamodeesaathan suthare - varuvin perunnaall ghoshikkaam;
Karnnaanandakaram geetham-raagasametham paadeedaam;
Vishvaasatthodaarppiduvin moraavoseshan dhanyan
Namme saatthaanil ninnum-paapatthil ninnum veendaan
Mahimoththhaanam moolam thaan-raajyatthe nammallkkeki;
Than thaathannaaraadhanayum-sthuthiyaathmaavinnum nalkaam;
Avasaanatthollam sthothram-kartthaaveshuvinennennum.

Ee nyaayarnaall sraappikallum-maalaakhakallum vannetthi
Naathhanuyirtthelppikkukayaal - siddhanmaar santoshichu.
Bimbaaraadhanayil ninnum-thannude punaruththhaanatthaal
Rakshichathinaal sabhaye nee-mashihaaye kumpittaalum.
